name: PrimeTime Draft
tag_list: fantasy-football, fantasy-hockey, draft, board, draftboard, draftkit, software, application, hdtv
overview:
PrimeTime Draft is the creator of PrimeTime Draft™ Football and PrimeTime Draft™ Hockey - easy-to-use, visually stunning, flexible and reusable fantasy sports digital draft board software specifically designed for HDTVs.

PrimeTime Draft™ software is built on two fundamental ideas:

  1. A digital draft board should be simple and easy to use. Our software is designed to be used by anyone hosting a fantasy sports draft party. We keep the user interface streamlined so that you spend less time managing the draft and more time enjoying the party.

  2. Everyone should always see the entire draft board during the draft. Our software dynamically sizes to fit the entire draft board on your HDTV. Everyone can see every team and every round - all the time!

PrimeTime Draft™ Football and PrimeTime Draft™ Hockey are the premier fantasy sports digital draft board applications - whether you are looking to simply ease the burden of draft management or wanting to take your draft party into PrimeTime!

Once you’ve experienced PrimeTime Draft™ Football or PrimeTime Draft™ Hockey, you’ll never want to draft any other way.
